name: The Last One (itch) (ladroid)
description:
Description

The Last One is a survival game, where you as a protagonist should survive among zombies. Lot's of people are infected.

Features

- Randomly generating world 

- Great lights

- Amazing sounds that are immersed in the game

Instructions

Controls

MoveWASD or Arrows
✓LookMouse✓InventoryE✓Go to the battle/homeEnter✓ShootLeft Mouse Button✓Drag/Merge Items InventoryLeft Mouse Button✓Turn on radioX✓
